Sentencas: We fabricate symmetrical cells adopting LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-delta (LNF) cathode with LNF-Gd0.2Ce0.8O2 (GDC) functional layer on scandia-stabilized zirconia electrolyte by screen printing.
Titulo: Chromium poisoning and degradation at LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 cathode with LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-Gd0.2Ce0.8O2 functional layer for SOFC under open circuit condition

Sentencas: Degradation of cathode performances by Cr poisoning is studied.
Titulo: Chromium poisoning and degradation at LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 cathode with LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-Gd0.2Ce0.8O2 functional layer for SOFC under open circuit condition

Sentencas: Specific polarization resistance (R (p)) increases with time to power of 1/4 and 1/3 in LNF cathode with and without functional layer under exposure of Cr vapors at 750 A degrees C for 900 and 500 h, respectively.
Titulo: Chromium poisoning and degradation at LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 cathode with LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-Gd0.2Ce0.8O2 functional layer for SOFC under open circuit condition

Sentencas: Electrochemical impedance spectra illustrate LNF exhibits greater R (p) than that of LNF with functional layer under exposure of Cr vapors due to strong Cr deposition at LNF/ scandia stabilized zirconia (ScSZ) interface.
Titulo: Chromium poisoning and degradation at LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 cathode with LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-Gd0.2Ce0.8O2 functional layer for SOFC under open circuit condition

Sentencas: No significant degradation in performance has been observed after 900 h of operating under the same condition due to very little Cr deposition at LNF-GDC/ScSZ interface, suggesting little poisoning effect for O-2 reduction on LNF cathode with functional layer.
Titulo: Chromium poisoning and degradation at LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 cathode with LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-Gd0.2Ce0.8O2 functional layer for SOFC under open circuit condition

Sentencas: These demonstrate LNF cathode with functional layer has high resistance towards Cr deposition and high tolerance towards Cr poisoning.
Titulo: Chromium poisoning and degradation at LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3 cathode with LaNi0.6Fe0.4O3-Gd0.2Ce0.8O2 functional layer for SOFC under open circuit condition
